website_summaries.verdict: Users praise the durability and flexibility of these cones, but without a strap or bag, they're not the most portable.
pros: 20 bright orange cones that easily stand out on the field
Soft and flexible enough that they will bounce back to their original shape if stepped on
cons: These cones don't come with a carrying bag or strap for keeping them together when you're not using them

customer_reviews.title: You'll never want to use standard cones again!
customer_reviews.text: I just love these cones and other coaches are jealous haha! they are soft and flexibly so its great for marking the outside of the field and not worrying about them interrupting game play! You can run over them (which happens a lot) and the ball can run over them and they last! its perfect for making obstacle courses for the kids to dribble the ball around and they are highly visible. I will never go back to the standard tall cones after using these! I did not buy a strap for them however I did grab an old belt that I use to keep them organized and together!
customer_reviews.author: J.Dibs

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for my purpose
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a smaller, more easily portable wasy to number my Rally Obedience course (smaller than the cones often used for the purpose). They worked very well; I wrote the numbers on the disc cones with a Sharpie marker and was quite pleased. These disc cones are large enough that the numbers I wrote were easily visible, they can't be knocked over, and they sit so low to the ground that they do not blow around. Very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Motorcycle training
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for low speed motorcycle training and they are absolutely perfect for the application. Profile is low so the wind does not move them, flexible enough that they really don't move when run over.
customer_reviews.author: Blueeyedme

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: The product is light weight and does what its supposed to do, the problem? I used them about 12 times, each time 1 or two would literally crack with use, almost have the cones I have are pretty much useless, they are never stepped on or handled roughly, some happened from just stacking them and putting them in a storage bag and travelling with them to the field and dojo. I think I may buy something a little stronger next time.
customer_reviews.author: A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great for soccer drills
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to help me train for an adult soccer league I'm joining and for the cost these things are great. They are light and stack easy to fit in my practice bag, they are bright and don't knock over if the soccer ball passes over or past them. As some reviewers mentioned they fade in the sun, as you can see in my pictures I left them out in the Arizona summer sun for about 2 days so I don't recommend leaving them out when you're not practicing. 20 count is perfect for my needs, but if I ever need to order more I will surely order these again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kral

customer_reviews.title: Very light!
customer_reviews.text: I bought them to do slow speed motorcycle practice. the 20 package is enough for a good size practice course. I carry them in my motorcycle rear pack everywhere I go. They use almost NO space! Only complain I have is that they are too light and just the slightest bump with the bike will make them move, but don't most cones do that anyway? Wind might pick them up? I didn't have this happen, but it seems like it could be a concern.
customer_reviews.author: David Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Nice cones, great price
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with this purchase. These cones are durable and bright. And the price is right. My baseball kids have stepped and stomped on them repeatedly, and they're still going strong (I use them to get the kids to stand where they should for throwing drills). Highly recommended. I also received them very quickly from the third-party vendor selling them through amazon, from whom I ordered them.
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyC

customer_reviews.title: Good markers but the color fades quickly
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as markers for tent stakes to help reduce people stumbing over the stakes. They work great for that after I cut a short slit in the inside for the rope to go thru. Being flexible the tent stake can be pounded in or removed with the cone in place. They do seem to quickly fade and loose their color when left in the sun. Some spray paint for plastic should return them to bright visibility (but shouldn't be required for an item expected to be mostly used outdoors).
customer_reviews.author: Tom Warfield

customer_reviews.title: The height and the quanity is perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect, usually the cones are high and these being low we have no worries about tripping! Also typically you get only 4, with these (and my competitive family and friends we should be able to keep the "arguments to a minimum...(It's been too cold to test that theory yet...lol. Anyway I'm very happy with the purchase, price and delivery date as I am most of the time..There's always exceptions but with amazon It's more the rule:) Cindy
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Gibbons

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: The cones were purchased for soccer practice. The color of the cones are orange. They came well packaged. These cones are very light in weight terms, but because of the way they are designed they stay well put on the ground. There were 20 cones in this pack. I would definitely purchase again and recommend these to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Holds up well with kids
customer_reviews.text: The kids I teach in hapkido class get very excited when I lay down these little cones into an obstacle course for them during warm-ups
customer_reviews.author: Aumakua

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great price.
customer_reviews.text: Well-made product. my kids find many uses for them such as obstacle courses, bases for baseball or kickball, cones for soccer. These cones get thrown around, stepped on, and left out in the rain or the sun and still hold up good. The orange color makes them very easy to see on the ground from a distance. Since the cones stack into each other it's really easy to take them with you to the park.
customer_reviews.author: willDeb

customer_reviews.title: Good for Motorcycle Skills Course Set-Up
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for use as directional cones in motorcycle slow speed skill development drills and testing. Run over them without issue and just keep on riding. So low that they do not create safety issues, stay in place, but can be easily seen in parking lot.
customer_reviews.author: Karch Kiraly

customer_reviews.title: They bounce right back
customer_reviews.text: These inexpensive "cones" have worked well for my physical education classes. They delineate boundaries clearly, but they don't trip up students who tromp on them--they bounce right back (both the cones and the students). I've also used them to mark puddles on rainy days.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a very good price
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a very good price. I use the bright colored discsprimarily for tennis practice serve targets. Can also use them for ground stroke targets, and for other sports,
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence F. Kann

customer_reviews.title: Great field sport addition to teams.
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect addition to my flag football teams practice. I would totally advise getting these for field sports if you are worried about keeping cost low for your sport endeavors.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, Durable, and Fast Delivery
customer_reviews.text: well its is what it says it is, a set of 20 disc cones. I use them for football (soccer) practices and for exercises. they are a nice rubbery plastic not a cheap frail plastic. They should last me for ever. very nice price for 20, and it received this package on a Monday afternoon after I placed the order on a Friday night! I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: K.Renz

customer_reviews.title: Great little set for football or soccer
customer_reviews.text: Step up your training with a few sets of these. Just that little bit of extra discipline in marking areas for soccer or football make training that much better. They are great for setting up goalie drills for soccer, which is what I use them for.
customer_reviews.author: buckeyede06

customer_reviews.title: Great for road training
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to set up a motorcycle practice course. They are a nice bright color, flexible, hold up against wind, and durable. Don;t cause any problems when someone runs them over. Will purchase again when I need more.
customer_reviews.author: Chey Fregon

customer_reviews.title: Paint them
customer_reviews.text: Faded to almost colorless in a week of being out in the sun. They hold up well to being stepped on/
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Bought for basketball handling drills. Exactly what I wanted & expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Baker

customer_reviews.title: horrible product
customer_reviews.text: use red plastic bags they are thicker and won't fade, this fading in the sun for just 15 minutes is nasty making it pink then white - no joke!
customer_reviews.author: Walter Z

customer_reviews.title: Quality, no holder, but well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Good product, quality is excellent. Wish it came with some kind of case or holder but for the price I improvised my own and am perfectly happy.
customer_reviews.author: Teer

customer_reviews.title: Nice cones, will not hurt when driving on them
customer_reviews.text: Good cones: they are quite flat, soft, and have a good enough weight to them. Great for doing a motorcycle training course on an empty parking lot for practice
customer_reviews.author: T.Perraut

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for practicing motorcycle skills on empty parking lot.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to practice different motorcycle riding skills from time to time with my stepfather, but I can see they can be used for other things too. They seem well made. No complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jose A. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Quality satisfactory, price is very reasonable.
customer_reviews.text: These took awhile to receive but were worth the wait when price comparing with other offers. The cones appear a bit fragile but so far we haven't had any issues. They are a great addition to soccer training.
customer_reviews.author: legend

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for the price
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what I needed and you can't beat 20 of them for the price. I used them to practice my slow speed motorcycle maneuvers. Highly recommend for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for soccer practice!
customer_reviews.text: these discs are perfect for soccer practice. They are durable and lightweight. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: BranMaxDaddy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Bright, orange, flexible, high quality, and perfect for field use. Very nice product for me. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Dave M

customer_reviews.title: They were cones!
customer_reviews.text: Great cones for soccer practice. Kids can bump into them and I don't have to go and pick the cone back up because the ball just rolls right over them.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Value and quality of the product
customer_reviews.text: The quality and value of this product was great. We ordered these cones and divided them upon among the players on the team we coach so they would have them at their homes for extra practice training sessions.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine M. Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Durable, kind of flimsy.. Very bright, can see at night, and in high grass.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good cheap cones for practice drills. Pop right back up if stepped on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than what they appear. But work for smaller feet
customer_reviews.author: scorpionfrenzy

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Super durable, I’ve had them for years and not a one has broke. I like that the designs keeps them still even on windy days.
customer_reviews.author: Shayla Fox

customer_reviews.title: these have worked great so far
customer_reviews.text: these have worked great so far, i bought these for my 7yr old son to help train for football i like these because you can step on them and they are fine
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I like these cones much more than the ones I've found at big box stores. They're very flexible and can take being stomped on without creasing, splitting, or losing their shape. Great value and with 20, I never have to worry about having enough for soccer practice.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe G

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I built an obstacle course in the backyard and this came in handy! Don't leave out in the sun,they will change colors,which wasn't a biggie for me! Other than that,it did exactly what I wanted it to do!
customer_reviews.author: ebowers26

customer_reviews.title: Great for kid games
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to mark a soccer field they are great for this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and efficient! Get's the job done!
customer_reviews.text: I use it outside, at the gym, or pretty much anywhere. They are small and easy to carry around in your gym bag and you can do a variety of exercises with these cones because you get so many of them. You can set up an elaborate training station with different set ups like I do and still have a few cones left over. They are not the best quality but for the money you pay, you definitely get a bang for your buck, and they get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Kim

customer_reviews.title: Standard cones for low price
customer_reviews.text: To me, this was the best cone-to-dollar ratio. Having this many cones is overkill for my purposes (pick-up sports and one-person running drills) but it's better to have too many than too few. I don't mind lending some out, for example. The cones themselves are pretty standard. You've probably seen cones just like them before. Some prefer the taller cones for visibility, but these are visible enough and can take a beating.
customer_reviews.author: Allan

customer_reviews.title: this is exactly what i read about this cones, ...
customer_reviews.text: this is exactly what i read about this cones set... It serves its purpose for me to mark motorcycle drills and they sustain well when wheels stomped on them..
customer_reviews.author: Elio

customer_reviews.title: Easily pops back into shape after being stepped on or ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely soft plastic and seems durable enough for the price. Easily pops back into shape after being stepped on or flattened.
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: Soft, but durable
customer_reviews.text: These are good little markers; we use them for Cub Scouts, both indoors and outdoors. You get 20, which is pretty good for the price; they're just as visible as a taller cone. The boys *do* like to throw them like Frisbees, but they're soft enough that it doesn't hurt when they inevitably conk each other with them. If they get stepped on, they're squishy, not brittle. They stack (of course) into a compact stack. I do have a set of , and we plop the ring-markers over the tip of these. The two sets work nicely together for bike obstacle courses, indoor races, all kinds of uses!
customer_reviews.author: Folina Dubernol

customer_reviews.title: Better Quality Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. I had expected these to be cheap hard plastic but was pleasantly surprised to find they are very flexible and soft. Great quality that will obviously last a very long time. My son loves using them for practicing soccer drills.
customer_reviews.author: Greg A.

customer_reviews.title: For motorcycle riding practice
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for motocycle riding practice. They work great and they stack nicely for storage
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice cones for the price. They serve their purpose at $0.45 each. I also went to local hardware store and purchased 2 feet of plastic chain for $0.76 a foot and used a metal clip to clip ends together as a holder.
customer_reviews.author: Riptide

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Faded in the sun after one day and don’t hold their shape
customer_reviews.author: Bvirtuous

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for practicing motorcycle maneuvers in a parking lot. Very bright color makes visibilty excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Ahh Chu

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful. I use them for 4 sports and have had no problem.cleats don't even mess with them. That is what I was scared of when I ordered them.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Best value.
customer_reviews.text: Great value. I used the cones for soccer drills for my daughter and having the 20 cones makes it very versatile for many types of drills. Worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Bull Trader

customer_reviews.title: Great cones. The only reason I'm giving this a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great cones. The only reason I'm giving this a 4 star instead of a 5 is because the picture didn't match the color hue of the cones I received. Other than that their great for my training.
customer_reviews.author: Juan S.

customer_reviews.title: Coach my daughter's basketball team - they completely slip on ...
customer_reviews.text: Coach my daughter's basketball team - they completely slip on a basketball court surface. Zero traction. Do not use them.

customer_reviews.title: Small but visible.`
customer_reviews.text: Bought them to improve riding skills on the motorcycle. Worked to outline the circles, figure 8's, etc., but are very small and, if windy, will move around.
customer_reviews.author: Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Cones. Nothing more nothing less
customer_reviews.text: I wanted cones. These were cones at a good price. I bought them. They make me smile because they are good.

customer_reviews.title: Cone set
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for use for my classroom because I am a teacher. I teach PE 4 times a week for 6th grade boys. These cones come in handy for all our various drills and activities.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very very thin! I had bought for tennis practice to my kids, but this is too thin.
customer_reviews.author: G3A

customer_reviews.title: Good product, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These cones are a very good value. Someone else mentioned that they faded out, but mine have not lost their color at all, but I have only used them for 10 weeks. Great value for 20 cones. Just as sturdy as the nike and other top brands.
customer_reviews.author: Peter van Tilborg

customer_reviews.title: kind of lower quality. I need to put them ...
customer_reviews.text: kind of lower quality. I need to put them down in pairs to not get blown away. gets the job done. Probably wont last more than a season.
customer_reviews.author: King Solly

customer_reviews.title: Easy to see
customer_reviews.text: Not only are these little cones easy to see, we run over them all the time. Good when you have to cover a large distance and you do not have the time or space for the big heavyset cones. These are cheap small easy to see flexible cones.
customer_reviews.author: mycorrhizae

customer_reviews.title: Ok cones
customer_reviews.text: These are fading to a light orange on the edges and are becoming brittle. They however do the job for now. Cheap enough to buy a new set in a year.

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your time searching for orange cones. These for the price point are the $$$$

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I was looking for... Affordable and durable cones for practice.

customer_reviews.title: great for tennis
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for tennis coaching. They are compact and stack very well so they are very portable. They also stay on the court on windy days. I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Better Price
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality cones for what I needed, a little flimsier than expected, but compared to the other sets of cones offered on amazon, this one is the best bang for your buck. Low height makes it more versatile to use for sports games. Made of bendable plastic so will not crack if stepped on. Comes in set of 20 and great for training purposes, relay races, ultimate frisbee & soccer goal/boundary markers, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great product, very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Great product, very happy with it. We use it to train my son's soccer team, it works great. Great item to add to your soccer training bag or box.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these cones, small easy to use and store. Good quality we haven't had any break on us.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected, but gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: The picture is deceiving, I thought I was buying something that was traffic cone thickness and rubbery like in texture. Still a good product though. It's flexible, so it doesn't crack when my horse steps on them, and the edges aren't sharp like you see with some small plastic cones. A good value for the price.

product_meta.title: America Kicks Set of 20 Disc Cones Bright Orange
product_meta.description: No coach should be without marking cones, an essential at no matter what level you coach. At this price no coach can do without. Bright orange, they can be used for many activities and games. Use for drills, sideline/boundary markers, obstacles, targets. 2" high, set of 20. Stackable for easy storage.
